infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Swiperly needs access to your photos so you can review and organize them.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Swiperly needs permission to save photos back to your library when you recover them.

plugins.photosPermission: Swiperly needs access to your photos so you can review and organize them.
